snippet: LinkedIn said it would stop taking users' meeting notes from their calendars on Wednesday, after security researchers discovered that the company was transmitting sensitive data back to its Web servers without users' permission. The revelation came...
abstract: LinkedIn said it would stop taking users' meeting notes from their calendars on Wednesday, after security researchers discovered that the company was transmitting sensitive data back to its Web servers without users' permission. The revelation came just one day before LinkedIn's Web servers were breached.

headline.main: LinkedIn Tweaks Calendar Feature to Stop Taking Meeting Notes
